languages.text: "Я надеялась найти понимание тех, кто разделяет мой Путь". {n}Голос Ирлиэт дрожит от усталости и злости.{/n} "Но даже предки с Алайтока, при всей их мудрости и гибкости разума, не смогли отбросить ненависть к мон-кай, что обрекли на гибель тысячи душ невинных детей Азуриана. Я пыталась воззвать к свету в их душах — но все мои доводы лишь пенными волнами разбивались о скалы их непреклонности".

traits.locale_text: [lфрафт] Если активен каунтер Пути Воина, Ирлиэт через особый артефакт (уточняем у ГВ) связывается с кораблем эльдар и убеждает их не прилетать в коронус.
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."
languages.original_text: "Я надеялась найти понимание тех, кто разделяет мой Путь". {n}Голос Ирлиэт дрожит от усталости и злости.{/n} "Но даже предки с Алайтока, при всей их мудрости и гибкости разума, не смогли отбросить ненависть к мон-кай, что обрекли на гибель тысячи душ невинных детей Азуриана. Я пыталась воззвать к свету в их душах — но все мои доводы лишь пенными волнами разбивались о скалы их непреклонности".

traits.locale_text: "I was hoping to find understanding among the ones who are sharing my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and flexible thinking, could not reject their hatred of mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all of my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was hoping to find understanding among the ones who are sharing my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and flexible thinking, could not reject their hatred of mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all of my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have been hoping to find understanding among the ones who are sharing my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and flexible thinking, could not reject their hatred of mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all of my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all of my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Esperaba hallar comprensión en quienes comparten mi senda». {n}La voz de Yrliet tiembla de cansancio e ira.{/n} «Pero ni siquiera los ancestros de Alaitoc, con toda su sabiduría y agudo intelecto, han podido rechazar el odio a los mon-keigh que ha condenado las almas inocentes de miles de hijos de Asuryan. He apelado a la luz de sus almas, pero todos mis argumentos se han estrellado como olas rompientes contra el rocaje de su intransigencia».
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: «Esperaba hallar comprensión en quienes comparten mi senda». {n}La voz de Yrliet tiembla de cansancio e ira.{/n} «Pero ni siquiera los ancestros de Alaitoc, con toda su sabiduría y tolerancia, han podido rechazar el odio a los mon-keigh que ha condenado las almas inocentes de miles de hijos de Asuryan. He apelado a la luz de sus almas, pero todos mis argumentos se han estrellado como olas rompientes contra el rocaje de su intransigencia».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我本希望那些与我踏上同样道途的人可以理解我。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音因疲倦和愤怒而颤抖着。{/n}“然而，即使是来自阿莱托克的先祖，即便他们拥有深邃的智慧与敏锐的头脑，也无法抑制对猴子的仇恨，因为猴子害死了成千上万无辜的阿苏焉之子。我试图唤起他们心中的光明，然而，我所有的论点在他们的固执面前，都像浪花打在岩石上一样粉碎了。”
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: “我一直都希望，那些与我踏上同样道途的人可以理解我。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音因疲倦和愤怒而颤抖着。{/n}“然而，即使是来自阿莱托克的先祖，即便他们拥有深邃的智慧与敏锐的头脑，也无法抑制对猴子的仇恨，因为猴子害死了成千上万无辜的阿苏焉之子。我试图唤起他们心中的光明，然而，我所有的论点在他们的固执面前，都像浪花打在岩石上一样粉碎了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'espérais plus de compréhension de la part de ceux qui partagent ma Voie, {n}dit Yrliet d'une voix qui tremble de colère et de fatigue,{/n} mais même les ancêtres d'Alaitoc, malgré toute leur sagesse et leur ouverture d'esprit, n'ont pu refouler leur haine des mon-keigh qui ont condamné des milliers d'enfants d'Asuryan innocents. J'ai essayé d'en appeler à la lumière qui luit en leurs âmes, mais mes arguments se sont brisés sur les rochers de leur intransigeance, comme des vagues sur un récif. »
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: « J'espérais plus de compréhension de la part de ceux qui partagent ma Voie, » {n}dit-elle d'une voix qui tremble de colère et de fatigue,{/n} mais même les ancêtres d'Alaitoc, malgré toute leur sagesse et leur ouverture d'esprit, n'ont pu refouler leur haine des mon-keigh qui ont condamné des milliers d'enfants innocents d'Asuryan. J'ai essayé d'en appeler à la lumière qui luit en leurs âmes, mais mes arguments se sont brisés sur les rochers de leur intransigeance, comme des vagues sur un récif. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私は、道を分かち合う者たちの間に理解を見出したいと願ってきた」{n}ユリエットの声は疲れと怒りで震えている。{/n}「しかし、その知恵としなやかな知性を持ったアライトックの父祖たちですらも、アシュリアンの御子らの何千という罪のない魂を破滅させたモン＝ケイへの憎しみに抗うことはできなかった。私は彼らの魂の中にある光に訴えようとしたが、私の主張はすべて、彼らの強硬さという岩の上で、まるで海の泡の波のように壊れてしまった」
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、道を分かち合う者たちの間に理解を見出したいと願ってきた」{n}ユリエットの声は疲れと怒りで震えている。{/n}「しかし、知恵と柔軟な思考を持ったアライトックの父祖たちですらも、アシュリアンの御子らの何千という罪のない魂を破滅させたモン＝ケイへの憎しみに抗うことはできなかった。私は彼らの魂の中にある光に訴えようとしたが、私の主張はすべて、彼らの強硬さという岩の上で、まるで海の泡の波のように壊れてしまった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte mir von jenen, die denselben Pfad beschreiten wie ich, Verständnis erhofft." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert vor Erschöpfung und Zorn.{/n} "Doch selbst die Ahnen von Alaitoc konnten trotz all ihrer Weisheit und ihres wendigen Intellekts den Hass auf die Chem-Pan-Sey nicht ablegen, der Tausende von unschuldigen Seelen der Kinder von Asuryan zum Tod verdammt hat. Ich habe versucht, an das Licht in ihren Seelen zu appellieren, doch alle meine Argumente sind an den Felsen ihrer Unnachgiebigkeit zerschellt wie Wellen aus Meeresgischt."
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte mir von jenen, die denselben Pfad beschreiten wie ich, Verständnis erhofft." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert vor Erschöpfung und Zorn.{/n} "Doch selbst die Ahnen von Alaitoc konnten trotz all ihrer Weisheit und gedanklichen Flexibilität den Hass auf die Chem-Pan-Sey nicht ablegen, der Tausende von unschuldigen Seelen der Kinder von Asuryan zum Tod verdammt hat. Ich habe versucht, an das Licht in ihren Seelen zu appellieren, doch alle meine Argumente sind an den Felsen ihrer Unnachgiebigkeit zerschellt wie Wellen aus Meeresgischt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Benimle aynı Yolu paylaşanlar arasında anlayış bulmayı ummuştum." {n}Yrliet'in sesi, bezginlik ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Ancak tüm o bilgeliklerine ve uysal zihinlerine rağmen Alaitoc'taki atalarımız bile binlerce masum Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nu ölüme terk eden mon-keighlere karşı nefretlerini inkâr edemedi. Ruhlarındaki aydınlığa ulaşmaya çalıştım ancak tüm savlarım, inatçılıklarıyla diktikleri o kayalara dalga dalga çarpan denizköpükleri misali bertaraf edildi."
languages.original_text: "I hoped to find understanding among those who share my Path." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with weariness and anger.{/n} "But even the ancestors from Alaitoc, despite all their wisdom and supple intellect, could not reject their hatred of the mon-keigh who doomed thousands of innocent souls of the Children of Asuryan. I tried to appeal to the light in their souls, but all my arguments broke on the rocks of their intransigence like waves of sea-foam."

traits.locale_text: "Benimle aynı Yolu paylaşanlar arasında anlayış bulmayı ummuştum." {n}Yrliet'in sesi, bezginlik ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Ancak tüm o bilgeliklerine ve uysal zihinlerine rağmen Alaitoc'taki atalarımız bile binlerce masum Asuryan'ın Çocuğunu ölüme terk eden mon-keighlere karşı nefretlerini inkâr edemediler. Ruhlarındaki aydınlığa ulaşmaya çalıştım ancak tüm savlarım, inatçılıklarıyla diktikleri o kayalara dalga dalga çarpan deniz köpükleri misali bertaraf edildi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
